mapper.select: select pp.name, pp.brand_name as brandName, pp.product_category_name as productCategoryName, sc.name, sc.start_time as startTime, sc.end_time as endTime, sc.amount, sc.publish_count as publishCount, sc.use_count as useCount, sc.receive_count as receiveCount from sms_coupon_product_relation scpr inner join pms_product pp on scpr.product_id = pp.id inner join sms_coupon sc on scpr.coupon_id = sc.id and not exists(select 1 from sms_coupon_history sch where sch.coupon_id = sc.id and sch.member_id = #{id})
